projects.title: Bhartiya Jan Sewa Pratishan: Banswara
projects.aim: Working to provide education within tribal communities and run residential schools in larger townships. Empowering over 50,000 students through 522+ schools throughout rural Rajasthan.

projects.title: Samtol Foundation: Mumbai
projects.aim:
The NGO aims to reunite runaway children, some as young as 9. These children runaway from all over India and come to Mumbai in the hope of finding fame and work. The NGO works with the children’s families via counseling, education and liaising with the authorities to reunite them with their families.

It works with the children who arrive at Mumbai’s busiest railway stations, shelters them and provides an education whilst helping them to contact their families and work through the domestic problems, which led the child to runaway.

projects.title: Seva Sahayog: Pune
projects.aim:
To engage socially conscious corporate, groups and individuals, with other NGOs of matching interests.

Empowering slum communities through:

  • Improving understanding about health care & access to health care
  • Providing vocational training for women with a focus on sustainability
  • Education via outreach programs and novel, practical learning experiences

projects.title: Kamalini Karnabadhir Vidyalaya: Thane
projects.aim:
Kamilini Karnabadhir Vidyalaya is a school with a sole purpose of supporting the mental, emotional and physical growth of hearing impaired children.

Alongside this is endeavours to develop the child’s confidence and self esteem so that they do not remain vulnerable.

It also aims to provide them with an education that will enable them to integrate within the society and to find employment.
